<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3108</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 8: The computer exhibition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 8: Die Computerausstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 8 : L'exposition 
d'ordinateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 8: O exhibition do
computador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 8: La mostra del 
calcolatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 8: Η έκθεση υπολογιστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 8: La 
exposición del ordenador</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this assignment there is a composition, but the paragraphs and the sentences within the paragraphs are in the wrong order. The student is required to put the paragraphs in the correct ordoer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thinking skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paragraphs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logical order</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Anweisung gibt es einen Aufbau, aber die
Paragraphen und die Programmsätze innerhalb der Paragraphen sind in 
der falschen Ordnung. Der Kursteilnehmer wird benoetigt, die 
Paragraphen in das korrekte ordoer einzusetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette affectation il y a une composition, 
mais les paragraphes et les phrases dans les paragraphes sont dans la 
commande fausse. L'étudiant est requis de mettre les 
paragraphes dans l'ordoer correct.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atribuição há uma composição, mas os 
parágrafos e as sentenças dentro dos parágrafos estão na ordem 
errada. O estudante é requerido pôr os parágrafos no ordoer 
correto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa assegnazione ci è una composizione, ma 
i paragrafi e le frasi all'interno dei paragrafi sono nell'ordine 
errato. L'allievo è tenuto a mettere i paragrafi nel ordoer 
corretto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την ανάθεση υπάρχει μια σύνθεση, αλλά οι 
παράγραφοι και οι προτάσεις μέσα στις παραγράφους είναι στη 
λανθασμένη κατάταξη. Ο σπουδαστής πρέπει για να βάλει τις 
παραγράφους στο σωστό ordoer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta asignación hay una composición, pero los
párrafos y las sentencias dentro de los párrafos están en la orden 
incorrecta. Requieren al estudiante poner los párrafos en el 
ordoer correcto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">denkende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paragraphen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
